mapper.sql: id, vehicleid, vehicleno, remarks, creator, createtime, modifier, modifytime
mapper.insert: insert into tr_blacklist_db_manage (id, vehicleid, vehicleno, remarks, creator, createtime, modifier, modifytime) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into tr_blacklist_db_manage
id,
vehicleid,
vehicleno,
remarks,
creator,
createtime,
modifier,
modifytime,

mapper.update:
update tr_blacklist_db_manage
vehicleid = #{vehicleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vehicleno = #{vehicleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifytime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tr_blacklist_db_manage set vehicleid = #{vehicleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehicleno = #{vehicleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifytime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(0) from tr_blacklist_db_manage
and name like '%${vehicleno}%'

select
from tr_blacklist_db_manage
and name like '%${vehicleno}%'
order by createtime desc
limit #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{limit,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from tr_blacklist_db_manage where state = 1
and vehicleno like CONCAT('%', #{likeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
order by createtime desc limit 0,20
